items.title: Introducing: Reading and Resistance—And How Literature Has Always Been Tied to American Freedom
items.description: A new series to bolster your spirit and even show you ways you can join in resisting.

items.title: Here’s What You Can Expect from the HEARTSTOPPER Movie
items.description: Here's everything we know so far about the upcoming Heartstopper movie, which will wrap up Nick and Charlie's story.

items.title: Straight on ’til Morning: Enchanting Merch for Peter Pan Day
items.description: Celebrate Peter Pan Day (aka J.M. Barrie's birthday) with these Peter Pan-themed accessories and decorations!

items.title: The 10 Most Popular Books of April, According to Libby
items.description: Here are the most commonly checked out library books through the Libby app.

items.title: Spilling the Tea on the Fiction Pulitzer
items.description: The fascinating story (and discontent) behind the selection of the Pulitzer in Fiction winner, the "Fyre Fest of book festivals," and more.
